entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-07-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to set toolbar overflow menu color if not using shell. #23563
  • The MAUI App Template still doesn't build because of the splash screen #23562
  • Unable to Navigate Between Entries Using Tab Key #23559
  • [Binding SG] XamlPreCompile task fails on Windows #23558
  • [MAUI]I9_Scrolling - Clicking 'Scroll to Proboscis Monkey' button does not scroll to the correct position when 'ScrollToPosition' is set to 'MakVisible' & 'Center' & 'End' #23556
    Backlog
  • On IOS - After Updating new Package Microsoft.Maui.Controls-8.0.70 App is not Compiling #23554

Closed

  • [.NET 9 Preview 6, Windows] Resizetizer may create some images that are larger than 200KB, which fail the Windows App Cert Kit test #23564
  • Sqlite issue in MAUI after upgrade from Xamarin forms application to MAUI application #23555
  • iOS App build fails when using MAUI 8.0.70 #23557
  • Win platform WebView cannot be release after its parent window get close #22972
    Backlog
  • WebView MAUI WinUI Memory Leak #20283
    Backlog
  • Failure Building Due to Splash Screen Image splashSplashScreen.png #23363
  • [Properties > Build Actions] options available depend on order of TargetFrameworks in .csproj - Cannot see all options at once - Only the first OS's options are shown #23523
  • Provide a better error message or try to load PNGs if user specifies svgs #23275
  • IOS build failed with "You may also need to include 'iossimulator-x64' in your project's RuntimeIdentifiers" #23352

PullRequests

Merged

  • [net9.0] Merge main to net9 #23513
  • Fix the batch file for running local dotnet on windows #23541
  • [windows] fix memory leak in WebView #23540
    platform/windows 🪟, memory-leak 💦
  • use MathF where possible #19965
    area-drawing, legacy-area-perf, community ✨, t/perf
  • Remove mobile test from running on desktop #23550
  • [android]: ModalContainer Destroy commit allowing state loss #23400
    community ✨
  • [net9.0] Update to preview7 versions #23544
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • HybridWebView control for integrating JS/HTML/CSS easily into a .NET MAUI app #22880
    do-not-merge, area-controls-hybridwebview, 9.0-preview7
  • [iOS] Span's TapGestureRecognizer not working if text is truncated #22213
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-gestures
  • [Windows] Add TitleBar Control #23019
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window, .NET 9 Planning
  • [Windows] Subscribe pointer events only when needed #23515
    community ✨
  • Android ecosystem updates based on net9.0 branch #23271
    area-infrastructure
  • [iOS] Read only Editor is editable when Next from on screen keyboard #22501
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-keyboard, area-controls-editor
  • [net9.0] Enable back the failing Shell tests #22830
    area-controls-shell, area-testing, testing-reenable
  • [Windows] Avoid crash doing Application.Current.CloseWindow of hidden Window #22852
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-window
  • Don't throw exceptions on back-to-back window deactivations #23519
    platform/windows 🪟
  • Make sure resizetized image files are writable #23412
  • [CI] Bump xcode 15.3.0 #22611
    do-not-merge, area-infrastructure
  • Batch CollectionChanged events #20036
    legacy-area-perf, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf
  • [Core] Enforce CA1507 - use nameof() where possible #21962
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #22927
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
